content.detailedDescription: Susann was driving up state road 658 towards turberville va.  she was about fivemiles north-west from home when she saw a pyramid-diamond shaped object in thesky.  it was very shiney and reflecting a lot of sun light, that is what madeher first noticed it.  she at first thought it was a plane but noticed it wasnot moving and could not see any wings.  she next pulled off of the road towatch it.  she estimates it was about 1000 feet high at a distance of 3/4 of amile over a wooded area.  it never moved just stayed in one place and made nosound.  she said she watched it for two full minutes as it just hung there inone place.  it just vanished while she was looking at it and she is sure it wasnot a blimp or a balloon, but some sort of ufo.  after it vanished she droveoff.
content.summary: Diamond shaped shiney object

content.detailedDescription: It appeared to have come out from the direction of the full moon, which was tomy left.It went off in a very rapid parallel direction, and the comet-like trailor vapors which followed it were no more. it hovered minus the trail(s) and thenappeared more round. the orb was incandescent green with a vibrantly bright redhalo surrounding it. it absolutely was not of this planet.I lost sight of itafter about 4 minutes. basically i was calm during the event but scared shitlessafter. at first it looked like a comet but then when i saw it was moving toofast to be a comet i thought it was a ufo. i was listening to my cd player withmy dog sitting with me outside when my cd player stopped working and my dogstarted wimpering. then i heard a humming sound. when i looked to the north westi saw it. it left my sight when it was going in the south east,
content.summary: Saw a green orb coming from the north west

content.detailedDescription: This was an exact duplicate of case no. 1-520, please close this case.Bland pughflorida mufon state director

content.detailedDescription: The incident was on a cold morning at about 5 am on a day in october 1961 atfort jackson, sc trainging base. there was a company of soldiers out for amorning run. we were standing in formation, and i happened to look up in the skyand saw 4 sharp points of light in a square formation. the stood still and alsodarted around in the sky at odd angles. because of the odd angles, i knew itcouldnt be an airplane or a helicopter, because planes and helicopters cantchange angles that quickly. i was only 18 at the time (now 58), but remember itas if it was yesterday. when i saw this i mentioned it outloud to all the othersand dozens of them saw it also. not much was said about it at the time, but idid think the incident quite odd. never did know what it wasit just couldnt have been a plane or gas, or balloon. this is all i remember ofthis incident from 40 years ago now.Erwin a. siegel, alexandria, virginia
content.summary: Saw four lights in the sky moving at odd angles to

content.detailedDescription: sitting outside, lts off, 9 pm. kathy noticed oddorange lt close to horizon in sw. object appeared to be very high, nodiscernible features, internally lit w/ dull orange lt. fuzzy edges, throughbinoculars, appeared to change shape slowly, no edges, just bloblike. moved instr line towards ne, straight overhd to a point slightly ne of us, took2b/- 3 min, then appeared to hover for2b/-1 min, then went straight up. there were no lights on the object, just theinternal glow. no features. object appeared to be very high, and if so, wasmoving very fast.
content.summary: Saw amorphous, orange object moving ne at 9:00 pm

content.detailedDescription: My husband (witness2) drove home from an outdoor meeting @7:30 pm. he called meon his cellphone, said me and teresa and her husband are lokking at a ufo in thenw. look out the window and see if you can see it. i saw it out the bathroomwindow, and it looked like a bright flashing star or planet. he got hope @ 10minutes later and we looked with binoculars, but they gave a blurred view. wealso saw another one near it. they just hovered very far in the diastant sky,and @ 8:45 seemed to slowly move further away and disappear. the next night onereappeared in the same place @ 7:30pm and through a mead telescope we saw thatit changed from all red lights to all green lights to all white lights. theyseemed to be rotating. you couldnt see a structure just the rotating lights. itappeared oval or round seen from an angle that made it appear round. my husbandthought it appeared octagonal or pentagonal. on 10-19-01 we observed it again atabout the same time frame.
content.summary: Rotating, flashing lights on round or pentagonal f
Star like objects emitting pulsing lights hovering

content.detailedDescription: On 10/8/01  about 0550 am  while driving onthe belt pkwy. west  we have seen avery fast  flying object .The object was flying from nw to se.The object  had 3blue lights and was flying about 6 times  faster  then  any jet liner taking offfrom jfk airport.The sighting  was for few seconds only.Please limit yournarrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
content.summary: 3 blue lights

content.detailedDescription: I was in the garden bringing the washing and looking at the sky when i saw a redobject approach from the west then another object approach from the east- bothred in colour, when they met they stopped adjacent to each other and went fromside to side (rocking back and fore) for about 10 mins then stopped and changedcolour -white- then back to red. they would then either change direction and onego north and one go south or shoot off in original pathways and always return tomeet side by side and repeat sequence and colour change. i realised these couldnot have been anything else other than ufos. they were at high speed, fasterthan i have ever seen. when rocking from side to side they were too close tohave been aircraft with blades or wings. lost sight when ufos shot off inopposite directions to each other. no noise heard. the size from the groundaspirin size/oval.
content.summary: Two oval shaped - red / white (alternating)stoppin

content.detailedDescription: I have already typed this out and its rather long and still i have left out someof the things we saw. we were just out to go shooting and camping for the nightand well alot of crap happened. we were by edwards afb off the 395, west ofbarstow. this event has ruined all of our friendships and i wish the things thatwe wittnessed were not as they were. if you would like me to send you the wholeaccount please email me back and i will send it to you. i have photos that doshow something.
content.summary: Unconvenal flying object-(s)

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my mountain bike about three miles from my home.  i had just comeout of some woods into an open field about 500 yards long.  the field wassurrounded by tall trees.  above the trees in front of me at a height of about1,500 feet at a distance of less than 1/2 mile was a a stationary or hoveringvery bright-shiney-rounded-edged- pyramid, or teardrop shaped object. it did notmove for the 5 to 10 seconds i saw it and was very shiney reflecting a lot ofsun.  the side facing me also seemed to be some what bulged out in my direction. i do not think i have ever even seen a drawning of some thing like this one.  iwould guess it was the size of a small house.  i continued pedaling and lookinguntil i came too close to the trees which blocked my view of the object.  iturned around and pedaled back in the direction i had just come from to get itback in view, this took about 15 seconds, all the time looking back over myshoulder.  i never did see it again, it just vanished.  i then went as fast as icould back in my original direction knowing there was a large open area on theother side of the woods which i reached in maybe 1 1/2 minutes, but there wasnothing in sight.  i also had a strong feeling i was being watched while i waslooking at the object.  the object made no sound, but i did hear and see a propdriven plane five minutes later coming from the west.
content.summary: Pyramid shaped object

content.detailedDescription: Occurred : 8/2/2001 07:25 (entered as : 08/02/01 7:25 am)reported : 8/12/2001 19:31posted : 8/20/2001location : alton, vashape : cigar on my way to work on thursday 8-2-01 i stopped at a local gas station. as i lefti looked to my left before pulling out and saw a large cigar (what i firstthought was a blimp) shaped object at about four to five thousand feet. i live55 miles due north of rdu so it is common to see a jet every few minutes atthese altitudes descending into rdu. they are almost always going due south;this one was going south east. that caught my attention first, i next looked forwings thinking this must be a jet but could not find any. all i could see was alarge cigar shaped white-gray object with a slight glow about it, the size of ablimp, but moving along at a rate much faster than a blimp is capable of. i nextstarted to reach for my camera, as i did the thing seemed to shift into warpspeed and with in two or three seconds put a lot of distance between me and it.I would guess it was maybe three to five miles distant when i first saw it, thenwith in ten seconds a spot in the distance. i did not take a picture because bythe time i got my camera out of the case and turned on, it was so far away thepicture would have been a spec on the horizon. tom va mufon (our site is down)
content.summary: Cigar-cylinder object

content.detailedDescription: last night 10/15/01 at around 9:10 pm there were astring of objects in loose formation moveing east to west across arkansasmissouri border looked like orange pinpoints or a little larger i could see themclearly as orbs . they were reflecting the same color as the town lights ithink. that is why they seemed to be orange. there were ten of them moving veryfast at high altitude. there was a plane going by just after the incident . theyhad to have seen them go underneath or above them. their pattern was loosemoving from arrow shaped to string of lights. the sky was clear and still.
content.summary: String of orange ufos

content.detailedDescription: At roughly 2230 i took the dog out for the night.  at the time i remember astrange blinking light through the trees in the back yard obscured by the pinetrees, but thought nothing of it as we are in the hartsfield flight path.  acluple of minutes later i looked again and there were 3-4, then maybe 5 separatelights through the trees.  they were fairly stationary, though they obviouslydarted back and forth, and up and down, on a constant basis. i observed this for2 hrs. before retiring, though they were still there.  the same 4-5 lights werevisible the entire time, making it obvious that they were not aircraft, as iobserve aircraft every night flying in.  the faa in peachtree city informs metoday that they observed no ufos or other strange blips on their radar lastnight.  i find that hard to believe unless these objects were many miles away,which they could have been, as they only appeared the size of a large, brightstar.
content.summary: Saw 4-5 wobbling, zig-zagging lights in night sky
3 bright lights in sky moving in same direction

content.detailedDescription: on the evening of august 23, 2001, i was campingat don williams lake near ogden, iowa. my mother and daughter, who were campingwith me, had already gone to bed, and i was enjoying some quiet time alone nearmy dying campfire. i was reclining in my chair, looking at the stars on what wasa fairly clear night. at around 11 pm, i noticed that one of the stars in thenortheast part of the sky was starting to move. it moved slowly towards thesouth, increasing in brightness dramtically as it did so. at its brightest, iwould compare it in appearence to venus, but about 2-3x larger. after about 5-10seconds it slowed and stopped moving, dimming to its original brightness. it satmotionless for about 30 seconds, then increased in brightness again and shot offat a very high rate of speed towards the east, disappearing behind some hills onthe horizon. at no time did it make any sound.
content.summary: Bright light moved-hovered-changed direction not a

content.detailedDescription: on friday, 09/21/01 at approximately 10:00 p.M., me, my wife, and my son walked onto the pensacola beach pier to take in the view of a beautiful clear night. i was carrying a set of 10 x 50 binoculars, as we slowly walked towards the end of the pier, we occasionally stopped and looked at the quarter moon resting in the western sky.  we stopped four/five times to view the moon through the binoculars before reaching the end of the pier at approximately 10:15 p.M. upon reaching the end of the pier, i turned to view the moon again when i noticed a very bright light (white/orange) this time to the right of the moon (1). at first glance i thought it was a bright star and my wife said it looked like a light on a pole, upon veiwing this light with my binoculars, it appeared to be a "ball of fire" hanging in the sky.  beneath this ball  of fire was a glowing white ball that appeared to rest at the waters surface. the light maintained this appearance and location for approximately five minutes.  i estimate the light was roughly 1 to 1.5 miles away and roughly 4 to 5 hundred feet above the waters surface.  it appeared to be directly out from the san souci hotel.  i continued to observe this light through the binoculars when i noticed the "ball of fire" emitting what appeared to be sparks, like a sparkler (2).  the sparks seemed to only emit from this sides of the fireball.  my wife stated that she could also see the sparks flying as she stood next to me.  she had no binoculars as i continued to observe the fireball through the binoculars, sparks turned to what appeared to be blobs of "lava" (red/orange) falling from the fireball (3).  shortly after observing this, the fireball dimmed to non visible when two rectangles that appeared in the same location and was visible for maybe 30 seconds (4).  at this point, the fireball reappeared and i could alsosee a red pinpoint of light to the left and a pinpoint of light to the right.  after approximately one minute, the white pinpoint of light change to a blue/greeen color.  the white glowing ball at the waters surface was no longer visible, and this point, the lights began moving our way or easterly (5).  the lights continued to drift in our direction for the next three to four minutes when it stopped and seemed to hang in this sky.  the light again slowly proceeded in a easterly direction when it appeared to "tilt" and come to a pause briefly before slowly heading in a northerly direction.  when the object tilted, the bottom of the object was illuminated where i clearly saw some kind of structure thru my binoculars (6).  i estimate the object was approximately 1000 feet away at this point.  i estimate the object was approximately 60 to 80 feet wide or long and "thin" compared to its overall size - maybe five feet thick and was soundless.  the object slowly drifted to the north for approximately two to three minutes before disappearing behind a building to the north of the pier.  about 30 seconds later, the object reappeared on the east side of the building where it appeared to be stationary.  at this point, me and the family decided to try to follow the object so we hurried off the pier and headed to our car in the parking lot.  we observed the object - still stationary - as we quickly walked from the end of the pier to the entrance of the pier.  upon getting in the car and driving toward the direction we last observed the object.  we lost sight of the object and never saw it again.See drawing
content.summary: Observed strange object in sky at pensacola beach.

content.detailedDescription: i was 15 yrs old, i saw something out the backwindow of my house.  i looked in the sky and saw a round, silver objectw/lights.  i remember that it wasnt dark when i saw this, but the next thing iremember was it being black, night sky. when i arrived in the front, this objectmoved rapidly up into the sky, then took a sharp turn...As i watched, words cameto me that these intities communicate telepathically.  as it raced through thenight sky, it was as small as a star, that is when it took a sharp turn anddisappeared.  this has been so long ago (1972) that sometimes i think i dreamedit.  but, my sister remembers me going into the house and telling her what isaw.  i have often wondered if anyone else saw this over the night sky, thesummer of 1972, in virginia beach.
content.summary: Experienced a ufo sighting in the summer of 1972,
Bright round object very high w/rose colored cente

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my place finishing up a conversation with an old friend that ihadnt seen in a while, and i was gazing up into the night sky, it was crystalclear, and out of no where i saw an object that looked like a falling star, iwas facing almost due south, i told my friend that there was an ufo, and heturned to see it too, he refused to believe that it was anything other than asecret military plane, all of the sudden it made a 90 degree turn then it madeanother 90 until it had mad a return to its original path. it was real bright,but the outer edges seemed to turn blue and then back to the original color. itslowed down considerably, and then disapeared. we talked about it for awhile,then changed the subject. then i went inside after he drove off.
content.summary: I thought i saw a shooting star, until it made a 9

content.detailedDescription: saw very shiny discs. about 15-25. 50 npopele
content.summary: Shiny discs

content.detailedDescription: Witness stated that she, her husband, and her daughter were heading eastbound oni-96 on sunday march 11, 2001 when she saw what appeared to be 3 black objectsexiting a cloud.  the cloud appeared smooth with no ridges.  all of the objectswere leaving a trail of smoky stuff in the sky, which stayed there.
content.summary: Round black objects exiting cloud with black contr

content.detailedDescription: as i was outside smoking a cigarette with mysister around 8:25 p.M. est, we both noticed an object moving from north tosouth very rapidly almost as if it were a shooting star.  in about two- threeseconds time, we watched the blue light turn white, yellow, and then dissapear,like something had entered the atmosphere and had burned up.  i have seencomets, shooting stars, etc., but this was much larger, with a longer lighttrail.  it was probably above 30,000, and somewhere over the atlantic ocean fareast of portsmouth, n.H.  what i saw reminded me of gulf war footage as a rocketsoared horizontally across the sky.  im sure its not any alien spacecraft, buti am curious as to what the object was.  your help in figuring out thiscuriosity would be greatly appreciated.  if you cant help, could you direct meto a person, or group who may have more info, or ideas to figur out what it was. thanks, r.Frye,  rwfrye@hotmail.Com
content.summary: Burning object moving in southerly direction
